attributes.action: This is a petition to remove MPs housing allowance, to cut their income by one-third and to place a ten-year Cap on the tax contribution of their pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to remove MPs housing allowance, to cut their income by one-third and to place a ten-year Cap on the tax contribution of their pension.

Without any reference to the electors parliament has given up sovereignty, power and authority to a none elected centralised bureaucracy.  It has done this despite majorities wishes.  If our government and parliament are unable to carry out the tasks required of a full-time sovereign government then their remuneration should reflect their part-time status hence this petition

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
